metadata.name: The city where the soul rests.
metadata.description:
I have always dreamed of going to a distant city, where I could retire from the worries, problems and noise of the big city. And so, one day, I decided to fulfill my dream.
I rented a small room in a motel in a quiet area of a distant city, where birds can be heard singing in the morning, and in the evening you can enjoy beautiful sunsets. I felt completely alone, no one prevented me from thinking, reasoning and dreaming.
I spent my days in peace and serenity. I read books, drew and enjoyed every moment. 
I forgot about all my problems, worries and stresses.  I enjoyed every day and didn't want it to end.
But unfortunately, sooner or later, I will have to return to the big city and continue my normal life. However, now I know that there is always an opportunity to retire from worries and problems in order to enjoy life and be happy.
